    • Method Detail

      • artifactContainsClass

        boolean artifactContainsClass(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact,
                            String mainClass)
                              throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Tests if the given fully qualified name exists in the given artifact.
        Parameters:
        artifact - artifact to test
        mainClass - the fully qualified name to find in artifact
        Returns:
        true if given artifact contains the given fqn, false otherwise
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if artifact file url is mal formed

      • createArtifact

        org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact createArtifact(JarResource jarResource)
        Creates from the given jar resource the underlying artifact.
        Parameters:
        jarResource - the jar resource
        Returns:
        the created artifact from the given jar resource
